subject: Re: [junit] Testing classloader isolation?
msgSnippet: Until we have isolates in the Java VM the only alternative to non-delegating classloaders I can think of is forking a new Java VM. Since you are concerned
messageBody:
Until we have isolates in the Java VM the only alternative to
non-delegating classloaders I can think of is forking a new Java VM.

Since you are concerned about your client using classes from the
server, but no the other way around, it may be enough to run the
client in a separate VM that doesn't contain the server jar in its
classpath.

Stefan
